85237.summary: Some customers in Sylvan Lake are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
85237.title: Dec 8 - Sylvan Lake | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

85242.summary: Some customers in the Westview Heights area of Fort McMurray are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
85242.title: Dec 8 - Fort McMurray (Westview Heights) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
